啊.english: ah; (particle showing elation, doubt, puzzled surprise, or approval)

爱好.english: hobby; fond of; to like; interest

把.english: (mw for things with handles); (pretransitive particle); to hold

包.english: to cover; to wrap; to hold; include; (mw for containers, packages, etc.)

北方.english: north; the northern part of the country

被.english: by (indicates passive voice sentences); a quilt/blanket

而且.english: moreover; in addition; as well as

差.english: differ from; fall short of; poor; inferior

成绩.english: achievement; success; results (of work or study)

除了.english: besides; except for; aside from; in addition to

带.english: band; belt; ribbon; carry; bring; take along; bring up (kids)

地方.english: place; space; room; part, (fāng: local; regional)

短.english: short (in length, duration, or height); lack

锻炼.english: to exercise; work out; toughen; to temper

发.english: send out; to issue; to show (one's feelings) | hair

放.english: put; to place; to release; to free

分.english: divide; part; minute; cent | component; share; ingredient

关.english: to close; shut; concern; relationship; turn off; mountain pass

过.english: to pass; to cross; go over; (indicates a past experience)

换.english: change; to exchange; to barter; to trade

讲.english: to talk; to lecture; to explain; a speech

角.english: horn; angle; unit of money (1/10 yuan); corner (Kangxi radical 148) | role (theater)

接.english: connect; to meet; to pick up (somebody); to receive

经过.english: to pass; go through; as a result of

刻.english: quarter (hour); (mw for short time intervals); carve; to cut

拿.english: carry in your hand; seize; to catch

难过.english: be grieved; be sad; have a hard time

骑.english: to ride (an animal or bike); to sit astride

起来.english: (beginning or continuing an action); to rise; get up (from bed)

上网.english: to surf the web; to go online

条.english: strip; (mw for long thin objects); item

为.english: for; because of; to; for the sake of

为了.english: in order to; for the sake of; for the purpose of

习惯.english: habit; be accustomed to; usual practice

洗澡.english: bathe; take a bath or shower; bath or shower

向.english: direction; towards; to turn; to face

校长.english: principal (of school, college or university); president; headmaster

需要.english: to need; to want; to demand

一边.english: one side; on the one hand; at the same time

一直.english: always; all along; straight (in a straight line)

遇到.english: to meet; run into; come across

元.english: Chinese monetary unit; dollar; first; principal

愿意.english: be willing; want to; be ready

站.english: stand; a station; be on one's feet; service center

张.english: (mw for flat objects); to spread out; (common surname)

照顾.english: take care of; look after; give consideration

只.english: but; only; merely; just | (mw for birds and certain animals)

才.english: ability; talent; just now; not until

终于.english: at last; in the end; finally

注意.english: pay attention to; take notice of; be careful
